reviews.review_text: Friendly and approachable staff. Curb side pick-up was quick and easy. Also, shout-out to Love who rectified an issue with my order.

One stop shopping, very exciting to visit when youre in love with your pets. Very spacious, clean and well arranged, a lot of foods, treats, toys, clothes, accessories, and other stuffs for your pets. As far as I noticed, they cover dogs off course, cats, fish, birds, reptiles, and other small pets (like rabbits, hamster, guinea pigs, even rats and mice). Although I never used their service, but hard to miss that they also have grooming and training facilities. For the clothes, I found not too many choices, but for food and treats they have quite a lot options to choose. Installing their phone apps is worth it, where we can find promotion info, check stock availability, online shop, book appointment for services, etc. For Petsmart, keep up the good job!

Being here to get my new fish tank. I ordered a open top fish tank branded as top fin. It costed me $189 before tax. Filters, temperature controller, oxygen bar, and some more equipment. I spent another $200 on that. $4.99 per each fish. Got 30 fiahes but actually give me 28 fishes. Died 5, I have 23 left in a 40 gal tank. After spending so much money and effort on the new tank, we finally got a well-set fish tank. Perhaps, I have to get another 20 fish next time.
I love this store! Every time I go the staff is so friendly and helpful. I definitely one of my favorite pet stores because of the great customer service and great finds!

Big THANK U for pet grooming salon team! Every time when my French Bulldogs go to do nail trim or full bath they always treat them with love and patient! I can feel they really cares my dogs. Their Rewards program is worth to join as well, you can get coupons and points to redeem for cash.
Very nice &  friendly staff, the cashier was able to solve my need
Great selection.   Easy to find what looking for.  Associate Hannah was friendly helpful and most of all knowledgeable

Friendly staff. Great for fish a day fish needs. I took my pup in there to get a treat, he loves to walk around and say hi to other dogs, I check for sales, they have a lot of stuff but not always the cheapest. They offer grooming services as well.
The kittens favourite place! They really do have anything for pets! Staff is friendly, the place is organized and prices seem reasonable.

Masae and Mimi are salon pros. With over 10 years of grooming experience, they re especially good with mats. Our labradoodle leaves with a perfect furcut / blowout style every time! Thank you for your service!

As I waltzed into Pet Smart with my shopping list in hand, I couldnt help but feel a sense of excitement bubbling up within me. On my quest for 11 neon tetras, dog food, and other pet essentials, I was prepared for a whirlwind of an experience. And let me tell you, dear readers, Pet Smart did not disappoint! The moment I entered, I was greeted by a symphony of meows, barks, and the gentle swish of fish swimming in their tanks. Like a seasoned conductor, Pet Smart had orchestrated a harmonious blend of products and services to cater to a wide array of pets and pet parents alike. With my eyes set on the aquatic section, I was pleasantly surprised by the variety of fish on display. The neon tetras, in particular, caught my attention. They shimmered like tiny aquatic gems, boasting vibrant hues of red and blue. With the help of an attentive staff member, I handpicked 11 of these underwater dazzlers to take home to my own aquatic kingdom. Next on my list was dry and wet dog food, and Pet Smarts selection was nothing short of a canines dream buffet. From grain-free options to high-protein and even gourmet choices, the variety was extensive and tail-waggingly delightful. I managed to find the perfect balance of nutrition and flavor for my furry companion, leaving me feeling like a true doggy connoisseur. As for the other supplies, Pet Smart offered a plethora of options for both fish and dogs. From aquarium filters and heaters to leashes and chew toys, I found myself lost in a maze of pet care nirvana. The stores organization and knowledgeable staff made navigating through this treasure trove of pet supplies a breeze. In the end, my experience at Pet Smart was akin to a tango with my beloved pets - a dance of delightful discoveries and well-executed moves. With a cart filled to the brim with neon tetras, dog food, and other essentials, I couldnt help but feel grateful for this one-stop pet utopia. Pet Smart, you have truly outdone yourself, leaving this pet parent more than satisfied and ready for an encore. Bravo!

Ive always found what I needed there. Pretty much has everything you need for your pets. Staff are always welcoming and helpful when needed, as its a big store and a bit harder to find specific items. They have good options for fish and birds, and few lizards and hamsters as well.
It s a good place reasonable prices and if they don t have what you need there more than willing to order it in for you.
Wow great stock of all my items for my new kitty. We live down the road from this place and will shop there again. Staff was very friendly
Easy to find what you need, fairly well stocked, adorable cats up for adoption as you enter. This place is awesome. Also, theres seldom more than 2 or 3 people in line here! Quick in and out.
Always had good experiences here, nothing out of the ordinary. Nice selections, clean store, friendly staff.

The staff at this location seem to genuinely care about the welfare of the animals. I ve had a few interactions with them and all seem reasonably knowledgeable in the different departments as well. It s reassuring to know they re not just there to do a job but also have concerns for the living conditions of the reptiles, amphibians, and small mammals
Well stocked wide variety selection of pet needs. Very tidy store. Sometimes sold out of live bugs.

This PetSmart has a number of kittens to adopt, on top of having a large store, a great selection of pet-related items and various small pets. We submitted a form to adopt one of these kittens, and a few days later someone called us to come in and pick her up. She was 15 weeks old and a happy squeaker. Our Cats, before they got spayed and neutered had a kitten together and raised it, so we were hoping they would adopt Miley as their own - and after less then 24 hours the new family has already bonded. Miley seems very happy here and in-between the cuddling she loves to run around and explore the place. Shes also very affectionate and loves to eat. We would recommend PetSmart if you are considering adopting a kitten.

PetSmart is one of my go to place for dog accessories, shampoos, and toys. Staff are generally helpful. When you have an account and make purchases you can accumulate points to go towards future purchases. Sometimes they have great sales and I end up spending more than I originally planned. Well played, PetSmart, well played.
Great place for your pets stuff.  Staff is friendly and helpful.  Great environment.
Friendly staff, good selection of pet items
I was very happy with the service PetSmart provided. The staff was knowledgeable, accommodating, and gentle to my dogs. I was very satisfied with the outcome.

This is one of the longest serving pet stores in the region. Its located in a small strip mall along with a dollar store and the golf town. Across the street is Michaels craft store and Tim hortons. Theres also a sun given foods grocery store in the same parking lot. Thats actually the most challenging part of attending this store is the parking which can be quite busy. Otherwise the store is great because its so large and serves all types of pets from dogs and cats to small mammals, fish and reptiles as well. Of course they have food for all these types of animals which is great because we have a snake and are always looking for a local supplier. The store is always clean and not too busy period they have grooming services as well as dog training services. There is a had adoption centre at the front of the store. There seems to be enough staff that work here to provide a good customer experience overall. Value for money is what you would expect at a pet store and overall the experience is excellent. Definitely will come again.
The staff there are very friendly and helps you find anything you need. And you can find everything you want in the store. There is also a pet salon inside of the store.
Awesome time there , cats dogs birds fish Meowwwww
Great location Easy parking Good service

Super friendly staff. Ordered online took less that 5 minutes to pick up and leave store. Great parking and easy to get to from Vancouver . And if you are looking for an adorable kitty they are here!!
Helpful staff and generally have what I need for my kittens. They also have fun seasonal stuff for pets, like for Halloween!
The facility is world class.  Its the old 2010 Winter venue, so it is a must visit and experience.  The staff are great too.  The climbing wall is an awesome sport to try out too
THAY HAD THE CUTEST RATS!!! Got 2 more to add to the mischief. Great staff, they were very kind and helpful.

This store is the greatest! The staff are super friendly and knowledgeable plus their grooming is fantastic!! My fur baby is 11 years old now and HATES when we try and bathe her yet pet smart is able to get her looking beautiful every time :)) thanks a bunch!!

Always have the things I want ofc. I take my dog grooming every couple months and Crystal is my groomer, she is really kind and through and lets me know what she will do before dropping my dog off. She is very professional and knows how to make my pupper looks handsome at the end of the groom!
Good selection for a variety of pets. Staff are helpful.  Love the online shopping and pick up in store option. Allows you to see if the item(s) you need are in stock.

It was the first time I was bringing my sheltie in for a wash. Everything was simple and easy. They send you appointment reminders the days leading up and easy check in s online. I booked with Irene and she did an amazing job, my dog was so clean and fluffy. Would definitely go back!

so I ordered something online with a $10 giftcard. I threw away the gift card after the purchase as I didnt expect the order would be cancelled. I had to call in to see how they can help. The call got connected pretty quick and they gave me another $10 gift card and refunded my points for the purchase. Everything was done smooth and quick.

Having a pup and kitty Im at this store frequently. Ive also used the grooming salon here. Id say the staff in the store are very well educated about animals. I wasnt sure of the correct puppy food and spoke with a staff member and she gave me alot of good info and advice. The salon did an awesome trim and gave me a record of what services were performed on coco. From that Its easy to keep track of what you are paying for and what needs to be done next time. All in all a great store for everything!

Good store compared to the Vancouver one. Very well lit place and kind cashier who cared for the cat being housed at the store. I prefer coming to this branch as its quite wide selection for many small pet items.

Way above my expectations. There was this girl who was extremely helpful, giving extremely honest feedback that I greatly appreciated. Im a dog owner to be and her suggestions were honest, more like an owner to owner advice, than a sales associate advise. I would definitely go back there many times.

I was searching for a small fish tank and needed some help.  There were a lot of customers due to a sale but I approached after only a short wait.  Then while I was comparing tanks I accidentally dropped one and cracked it.  I was mortified.  The sales agent was so nice.  As i kept apologizing she just inspected, moved it off to the side and told me not to worry. Yes some prices are higher but they offer good hours, good range of supplies, price matches and Ive never been hung up on like I was for another pet store.  (Mr) They also have online inventory of in-store stock for some items.  If only they had it for all their items.
Brought my 6-month-old puppy in to get his nails dremeled. Krystal did such a great job I highly recommend her. Thank you so much krystal for taking such good care of tofu
I like this PetSmart. I had my dog take lessons here. Staff are friendly and helpful. I ve always been able to find what I need for my dog here and it is relatively close to home. Thank you PetSmart!
Great place to get all sorts of pet food.

Sidney is an amazing groomer, so sweet, she does an excellent job every time I bring my dog there (who has a VERY difficult kind of coat to groom). They always let me know how he was when i go to pick him up! excellent customer service

Always nice to visit this store. Friendly staff. clean environment. My son loves to say hi to each of the pet up for adoption. We just love learning about their stories and pray that each one gets a loving home.

Very knowledgeable,super friendly staff to seem to be working very hard.. I find that normally they seem to be somewhat under staffed.. that goes for each of the locations I have visited in the past.   This is not any fault of the staff in place during any of my visits to all locations in metro Van.  I guess one could almost suggest that they appear to be somewhat over worked ..just my outside opinion.

Crystal did a spectacular job taking care of my long-haired (double-coated) Chihuahua.  He looked great and he was obviously very happy.  Crystal also made sure to review the service with me and read over the online notes i made when booking the appointment. I look forward to returning in the New Year.

Great experience at this Petsmart! Great selection of toys and treats for my dog. Super friendly service from the staff. Even kind enough to call me a cab and let me use her phone. Nice place to shop and get advice.
Excellent service. The staff member didn t know the answer to my question but went in the back to check stock and brought me what I needed. Very helpful!

Just got my puppy recently so i decided to get some essential items. I was pretty clueless what to get until the staff there. Not only did she figure everything out but she also shared alot of her knowledge with me on how to raise a dog right.  They also have a great selection on many items. This will be my go to place from now on from all of my puppys needs!
My wifes friend gave us a 10 gallon fish tank and i had a lot of questions. The staff were very helpful and know their stuff. Especially when it comes to fish, care of the tank, etc.
The staff loves the animals and it shows! More raw food would be nice
The store had a huge selection but I was here for my dogs grooming. Came about 2 months ago and my Maltese poodle had a groom with Emily. Loved the haircut! She did a really good job
Excellent customer service. Very friendly and helpful staff

Our dog was always terrified of getting her haircut, but the terror has subsided since we started taking her to the salon here. The groomers are exceptionally kind and competent. So relieved that we found them!

Just visited their grooming salon based on a friends recommendation. Masae (the groomer) was super friendly and I could tell that she loved animals and loved grooming them. She took the time to understand the style I wanted for my bichon and the results were great!

Needed to get some wild birdseed and I called in and a girl was unbelievably helpful, knowledgeable and helpful. I didnt catch her name but thank you for all your help and info! My lil tweet tweets are happy happy happy and so am I.

Friendly staff with a great selection of toys for your pet who are always welcome. They have an excellent training program and in house grooming. Clean bathrooms with a pet friendly atmosphere. Pet smart does it right.
Best pet store in all of Richmond! Carries everything you need and the staff are very knowledgeable. I also love to order online and pickup in store! Makes for quick and easy shopping!
This is for the grooming service. After trying several different groomers, Masae here, is the best! Clearly loves dogs and her job.
Great place clean friendly
Kids love seeing the reptile and kitten.
Have most of the stuff you need for pets
Placed an order online and picked up in store, quickly. Staff were very kind. Thank you.
Great location. Not busy enough that it would scare my dog but quiet enough to feel like a neighborhood pet shop. Friendly staff, feels like toys R us!
Highly recommend their grooming services. You can tell that the groomers really care for all the dogs. You get a cute report card afterwards that shows what was done and how your pet did.
You can feed your pet here.
Every time I go to Petsmart, I love thr atmosphere and friendly staff. Although the shelves are empty but I am managed to find what I need
Evertime i come there always they have good deals. Ended up buying others stuffs too.
Stuff was always helpful and polite. Good selection of product however I had to switch to a different store because Pet Smart doesn t sell Veruwa.

Great selection of most everything for dogs, cats, rodents, birds, reptiles, aquaria and more with very competitive prices!  I shop here to save money on high quality items.  A very satisfied customer for years!
Very friendly knowledgeable staff.  Our puppy had an ear infection and the young man was able to help us out.  Puppy is happy, so are we :)

Staff is extremely cooperative every time I visit this place. There is no hurdle in getting anything returned if we have to. In addition to that, huge collection of pets and accessories to choose from.
Large amounts of cats and dogs food selection on a lower price. Fishes, birds, and bugs for sell. Cats for adoption in the front. Staff seems friendly. Been going there for a number of years now.
The place looks very neat and orderly.the staffs are very helpfull and you can feep that they always have a warm smile underneath that mask
Went there for buying treats and collar for my new puppy. Pet trainer is very friendly and give us a lot of great info regarding on grooming and training!

Just about everything you could ever need.  Urgently needed a ramp for my dog post surgery and I was thrilled at what I was able to find - it was exactly what I wanted and cost less than the same item, used on Craigslist.
great selection on cat litter products. great prices
Amazing service. Not very good transit access. Store clean staff very helpful

This is where we go to get food and litter for the cats. They usually have good sales if you have the members points card. They have a spot for cats that you can adopt. Its nothing special. Its a PetSmart.
Stop by to get some treats and toys for Cleo. Selection is always great. Not too many people so no line ups at all.
The line ups can get long for check out, but the associates are always so patient and friendly.
6 yes ago i got a crab and still well and alive . Thanks petsmart
I love it but its too good sometimes they stop you from doing what you think is right but is wrong other wise its the total best in Richmond.
Staff are always friendly and helpful at this location.
Staff at this location seem to change quite a bit, but they are all still very helpful and knowledgeable. Had my puppy trained here at their puppy training courses and it was very useful!

A big store with almost everything you need for your little family member. They provide classes for dogs in store. The service of adoption is also provided at the entrance. They also have fish to sell at the back.
Good hours wide range of pet supplies staff is very friendly and one of the last retailers to actually help with your purchase to your vehicle
I love coming here at night to pick up live pet food. Always fast service.  Nice and quiet too
Great price and inventory got what we wanted and shout out to Natasha for helping my nephew
Might not be a big Petsmart with many selections but Great & very friendly staff. One of my ducks favorite places to get her treat worms from!!!!!
Friendly staff that are knowledgeable who are pet lovers and owners. Large store with plenty of selection and competitive prices. Lots of parking and close to the highway.
Our cat has had 3 hair cuts and spa treatments. The grooming staff are awesome.
Went for Chameleon food. The worker was really knowledgeable and polite, also so tall that I lost my train of thought because standing next to him threw me off lol.
Pet products selection huge and customer service great. I have 2 happy puppies.
I bought 2 Guinea pigs, and the staff gave me a lot of suggestions and was really willing to help
Its great if you have a lot of Pets...lol , I have 2 dogs a cat, birds fish and a turtle and a Partridge in a pear tree
Emily from the grooming department has been our dogs groomer for a few years now. She does an awesome job!
Joseph the dog trainer at this store is very knowledgable. The classes are very informative. I look forward to the next one. .
I come in every six weeks to get my dog s nails clipped. Excellent service every time.
